MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.DataSource AzureBlobStorage (string name, string storageConnectionString, string containerName, string pathPrefix = null, Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.DataDeletionDetectionPolicy deletionDetectionPolicy = null, string description = null);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.DataSource AzureBlobStorage(string name, string storageConnectionString, string containerName, string pathPrefix, class Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.DataDeletionDetectionPolicy deletionDetectionPolicy, string description) cil managed

Public Shared Function AzureBlobStorage (name As String, storageConnectionString As String, containerName As String, Optional pathPrefix As String = null, Optional deletionDetectionPolicy As DataDeletionDetectionPolicy = null, Optional description As String = null) As DataSource
static member AzureBlobStorage : string * string * string * string * Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.DataDeletionDetectionPolicy * string -> Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.DataSource

Docs.param: The name of the datasource.

The connection string for the Azure Storage account. It must follow this format: "DefaultEndpointsProtocol=https;AccountName=[your storage account];AccountKey=[your account key];" Note that HTTPS is required.
The name of the container from which to read blobs.
Optional. If specified, the datasource will include only blobs with names starting with this prefix. This is useful when blobs are organized into "virtual folders", for example.
Optional. The data deletion detection policy for the datasource.
Optional. Description of the datasource.
Docs.summary: Creates a new DataSource to connect to an Azure Blob container.

Docs.param: The name of the datasource.

The connection string for the DocumentDb database. It must follow this format: "AccountName|AccountEndpoint=[your account name or endpoint];AccountKey=[your account key];Database=[your database name]"
The name of the collection from which to read documents.
Optional. A query that is applied to the collection when reading documents.
Optional. Indicates whether to use change detection when indexing. Default is true.
Optional. The data deletion detection policy for the datasource.
Optional. Description of the datasource.
Docs.summary: Creates a new DataSource to connect to a DocumentDb database.
